pageTitle: Re: Nikon El Segundo (USA): Any updates or recent repairs?: Nikon FX SLR (DF, D1-D4, D600-D800) Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   For what it's worth, it's interesting why the shipping label went to Melville instead of the usual El Segundo center for west of Mississippi. record for Melville fixing this issue appears to be really good based on what's reported on this forum. I submitted many more images for review and Nikon issued me a prepaid ship label to Melville. That's where my camera is now for more than a week now. I am optimistic as the Camera spent a week in shop and came back with same asymmetric left AF but only
